meaningMnemonic: I <radical>protect</radical> my own <radical>animal</radical>s by going to <kanji>hunt</kanji> other animals... like wolves and cougars and such.
readingMnemonic: I also do all my <kanji>hunt</kanji>s using a <reading>ca</reading>r (か). I just run those animals down with my car. Kind of cheating, but vroom vroom anyways.
